Package com.library.frontend.controllers.operator

Class CreateBookFormController

java.lang.Object
com.library.frontend.controllers.operator.CreateBookFormController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Controller, javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class CreateBookFormController extends Object implements Controller
Controller for creating a book form in the operator view.
